select tr.*, t.id tid, t.title tt, t.content tc, t.start_time tst, t.end_time tet, t.has_send_file thsf, t.need_answer tna, t.need_file_reply nfr, t.need_finish nf, t.parent_thing_id tpti, t.remind_time trt, t.create_time tct, t.update_time tut, t.creator_id tci, t.updator_id tui, u.real_name urn, tag.tag_name tagn from thing t left join thing_receiver tr on t.id = tr.thing_id left join user u on t.creator_id = u.id left join thing_tag tt on t.id = tt.thing_id left join tag on tt.tag_id = tag.id where tr.user_id = #{userId} and t.delete_flg = 0 and tr.delete_flg = 0 and u.delete_flg = 0 and tt.delete_flg = 0 and tag.delete_flg = 0
and tr.has_finished = #{thingReceiver.hasFinished} and t.need_finish = '1'
and tr.has_read = #{thingReceiver.hasRead}
order by t.create_time desc
select tr.*, u.real_name from thing_receiver tr left join user u on tr.user_id = u.id where tr.thing_id = #{thingId} and tr.user_id = #{userId} and u.delete_flg = 0 and tr.delete_flg = 0
